products.title: Splash Beige Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash beige roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 8.83 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured roller blind will make a wonderful addition to any room and will compliment wooden tones thoughout the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx1894 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash beige electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 122.00 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured elecrtric roller blind will make a wonderful additon to any room and will compliment wooden tones throughtout the home. Electric roller blinds work perfectly for more difficult to reach windows & can provide the perfect finishing touch when dressing a window. With a 5 year guarantee on all their products, you can rest assured that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
